## TextureSampleGrad.(constructor)

Creates a new texture sample with gradients node

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor();
```

## Remarks

Initializes with: - Two required inputs (texture and coordinates) - One output (sampled color) - Color sampler type by default

TODO: Add gradient inputs (dPdx, dPdy) for full explicit gradient support
